name: MovieChallenge
0:
”Alexa, open Movie Challenge”
”Alexa, ask Movie Challenge to start the game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie challenge
des: Movie Challenge is a movie quiz game that uses voice snippets from actual movies. You hear Arnold Schwarzenegger say, “I’ll be back”, and you answer, “The Terminator”. Or you hear Humphrey Bogart say, “Here’s looking at you, kid”, and you answer, “Casablanca”. With hundreds of movie quotes you will be sure to be both challenged and delighted. You can play solo or play in teams.
